name: VoxParrot (Twitch Chat Translator + Japanese TTS)
description:
simple windows system tray translate bot + japanese tts (voicevox)

you can turn on/off audio in settings

enter bot username and bot oauth in settings.txt - You can generate oauth from https://twitchapps.com/tmi

enter your channel name 

enter your speaker name (default 13 青山龍星 id:13 ノーマル)

go to voicevox folder and run run.exe

you can use with or without google translate

click VoxParrotWithGoogleTranslate.exe or VoxParrot.exe

ready!

Vox Parrot has no auto update sorry! go to https://camenduru.itch.io/voxparrot and check latest version

for more dev https://www.twitch.tv/camenduru

source: https://github.com/camenduru/PinkParrot

voicevox source: https://github.com/VOICEVOX/voicevox

you can listen to speaker voices from https://voicevox.hiroshiba.jp/
